chapter.title: CHM Edition Credits
chapter.para:
This enhanced version of the PHP Manual would never come to existence, if the following people would not help with their contribution to the project (in no particular order):
Holger Eggert, who created the two default designs, and provided many usability tips
Gonzalo De la Pena Andreu, who added many comments on how it would be ideal to provide the skinnable interface
Olexandr Vynnychenko added countless comments and testing all the time
Brendan Ferguson, who provided many optimizations, improvements to the HTML and JS codes behind the manual pages
Sandor Hojtsy, who coded the manual preferences desktop application
And at last but not least, everybody, who provided feedback through our mailing list, and in the user survey
